AD_EntityType.Help: Localizacion Colombia incluye las modificaciones necesarias en materia de impuestos para Colombia, manejo de retenciones de IVA, ICA y ReteFte, reporte de medios magnéticos para la DIAN, generación/validación del dígito de verificación del NIT. Desarrollado por http://globalqss.com

There are two reasons for de-activating and not deleting records: (1) The system requires the record for audit purposes. (2) The record is referenced by other records. AD_Field.Help: There are two methods of making records unavailable in the system: One is to delete the record, the other is to de-activate the record. A de-activated record is not available for selection, but available for reports. There are two reasons for de-activating and not deleting records: (1) The system requires the record for audit purposes. (2) The record is referenced by other records. E.g., you cannot delete a Business Partner, if there are invoices for this partner record existing. You de-activate the Business Partner and prevent that this record is used for future entries.
AD_Field.Description: The record is active in the system
AD_Field.Name: Active

AD_Field_Trl.Help: Hay dos métodos para que los registros no estén disponibles en el sistema: Uno es eliminar el registro; el otro es desactivarlo. Un registro desactivado no está disponible para selección; pero está disponible para Informes
AD_Field_Trl.Description: El registro está activo en el sistema
AD_Field_Trl.Name: Activo

AD_Field.Help: There are two methods of making records unavailable in the system: One is to delete the record, the other is to de-activate the record. A de-activated record is not available for selection, but available for reports. There are two reasons for de-activating and not deleting records: (1) The system requires the record for audit purposes. (2) The record is referenced by other records. E.g., you cannot delete a Business Partner, if there are invoices for this partner record existing. You de-activate the Business Partner and prevent that this record is used for future entries.

SQLStatement.statement: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW lve_txtiva AS SELECT replace(ainf.taxid::text, '-'::text, ''::text) AS rifempresa, btrim(to_char(date_part('year'::text, iw.dateacct), '0000'::text)) || btrim(to_char(date_part('month'::text, iw.dateacct), '00'::text)) AS periodo, (((to_char(date_part('year'::text, ci.dateinvoiced), '0000'::text) || '-'::text) || btrim(to_char(date_part('month'::text, ci.dateinvoiced), '00'::text))) || '-'::text) || btrim(to_char(date_part('day'::text, ci.dateinvoiced), '00'::text)) AS fechadocumento, CASE WHEN dt.docbasetype = ANY (ARRAY['API'::bpchar, 'APC'::bpchar, 'APD'::bpchar]) THEN 'C'::text WHEN dt.docbasetype = ANY (ARRAY['ARI'::bpchar, 'ARC'::bpchar, 'ARD'::bpchar]) THEN 'V'::text ELSE ''::text END AS tipooperacion, CASE WHEN dt.docbasetype = ANY (ARRAY['API'::bpchar, 'ARI'::bpchar]) THEN '01'::text WHEN dt.docbasetype = ANY (ARRAY['APD'::bpchar, 'ARD'::bpchar]) THEN '02'::text WHEN dt.docbasetype = ANY (ARRAY['APC'::bpchar, 'ARC'::bpchar]) THEN '03'::text ELSE ''::text END AS tipodocumento, replace(bp.taxid::text, '-'::text, ''::text) AS riftercero, CASE WHEN dt.docbasetype = ANY (ARRAY['API'::bpchar, 'APC'::bpchar, 'APD'::bpchar]) THEN ci.lve_poinvoiceno WHEN dt.docbasetype = ANY (ARRAY['ARI'::bpchar, 'ARC'::bpchar, 'ARD'::bpchar]) THEN ci.documentno ELSE ''::character varying END AS numerodocumento, ci.lve_controlnumber AS control, ci.grandtotal::text AS montodocumento, to_char(lve_impbase('bf'::bpchar, ci.c_invoice_id, ct.rate), '9999999.99'::text) AS baseimponible, to_char(abs(iw.taxamt), '9999999.99'::text) AS montoiva, "isnull"((( SELECT CASE WHEN dt2.docbasetype = ANY (ARRAY['API'::bpchar, 'APC'::bpchar, 'APD'::bpchar]) THEN ci2.lve_poinvoiceno WHEN dt.docbasetype = ANY (ARRAY['ARI'::bpchar, 'ARC'::bpchar, 'ARD'::bpchar]) THEN ci2.documentno ELSE ''::character varying END AS documentoafectado FROM c_invoice ci2 JOIN c_doctype dt2 ON dt2.c_doctype_id = ci2.c_doctype_id WHERE ci2.c_invoice_id = ci.lve_invoiceaffected_id AND (btrim(to_char(date_part('year'::text, ci2.dateacct), '0000'::text)) || btrim(to_char(date_part('month'::text, ci2.dateacct), '00'::text))) = (btrim(to_char(date_part('year'::text, iw.dateacct), '0000'::text)) || btrim(to_char(date_part('month'::text, iw.dateacct), '00'::text))) AND (date_part('day'::text, ci2.dateacct) >= 1::double precision AND date_part('day'::text, ci2.dateacct) <= 15::double precision AND date_part('day'::text, iw.dateacct) >= 1::double precision AND date_part('day'::text, iw.dateacct) <= 15::double precision OR date_part('day'::text, ci2.dateacct) >= 16::double precision AND date_part('day'::text, ci2.dateacct) <= 31::double precision AND date_part('day'::text, iw.dateacct) >= 16::double precision AND date_part('day'::text, iw.dateacct) <= 31::double precision)))::text, '0'::text) AS documentoafectado, vw.withholdingno AS numerocomprobante, lve_calcexento(ci.c_invoice_id) AS exento, to_char(ct.rate, '99.99'::text) AS alic, '0' AS expediente, iw.dateacct AS fechareten, iw.ad_org_id AS org, iw.ad_client_id AS client FROM c_invoice ci JOIN lco_invoicewithholding iw ON ci.c_invoice_id = iw.c_invoice_id JOIN lve_voucherwithholding vw ON vw.lve_voucherwithholding_id = iw.lve_voucherwithholding_id JOIN lco_withholdingtype wt ON iw.lco_withholdingtype_id = wt.lco_withholdingtype_id AND wt.type::bpchar = 'IVA'::bpchar JOIN lco_withholdingrule wr ON iw.lco_withholdingrule_id = wr.lco_withholdingrule_id JOIN lco_withholdingcalc wc ON wc.lco_withholdingcalc_id = wr.lco_withholdingcalc_id JOIN c_tax ct ON ct.c_tax_id = wc.c_basetax_id JOIN c_doctype dt ON ci.c_doctype_id = dt.c_doctype_id AND (dt.docbasetype = ANY (ARRAY['API'::bpchar, 'APC'::bpchar, 'APD'::bpchar, 'ARI'::bpchar, 'ARD'::bpchar, 'ARC'::bpchar])) JOIN c_bpartner bp ON bp.c_bpartner_id = ci.c_bpartner_id JOIN ad_org ao ON ao.ad_org_id = ci.ad_org_id JOIN ad_orginfo ainf ON ainf.ad_org_id = ci.ad_org_id;

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW lve_xmlislr AS SELECT upper(replace(replace(cb.taxid::text, '-'::text, ''::text), '.'::text, ''::text)) AS rifretenido, ci.lve_poinvoiceno AS numerofactura, replace(ci.lve_controlnumber::text, '-'::text, ''::text) AS numerocontrol, wr.code AS codigoconcepto, iw.taxbaseamt AS montooperacion, iw.percent AS porcentajeretencion, iw.dateacct AS fecha, upper(replace(replace(aoi.taxid::text, '-'::text, ''::text), '.'::text, ''::text)) AS rifagente, btrim(to_char(date_part('year'::text, iw.dateacct), '0000'::text)) || btrim(to_char(date_part('month'::text, iw.dateacct), '00'::text)) AS periodo, iw.ad_org_id AS org FROM lco_invoicewithholding iw JOIN lco_withholdingtype wt ON iw.lco_withholdingtype_id = wt.lco_withholdingtype_id JOIN c_invoice ci ON ci.c_invoice_id = iw.c_invoice_id JOIN ad_org ao ON ao.ad_org_id = ci.ad_org_id JOIN ad_orginfo aoi ON aoi.ad_org_id = ao.ad_org_id JOIN c_bpartner cb ON cb.c_bpartner_id = ci.c_bpartner_id JOIN lco_withholdingrule wr ON iw.lco_withholdingrule_id = wr.lco_withholdingrule_id WHERE wt.type::bpchar = 'ISLR'::bpchar AND wt.issotrx = 'N'::bpchar UNION ALL SELECT upper(replace(replace(cb.taxid::text, '-'::text, ''::text), '.'::text, ''::text)) AS rifretenido, '0'::character varying AS numerofactura, 'N/A'::text AS numerocontrol, '001'::character varying AS codigoconcepto, mov.amount AS montooperacion, ( SELECT round(a.amount, 2) AS round FROM hr_attribute a JOIN hr_concept c ON c.hr_concept_id = a.hr_concept_id WHERE a.c_bpartner_id = cb.c_bpartner_id AND c.value::text = 'A_FACTOR_ISLR'::text AND a.ad_org_id = mov.ad_org_id AND (a.validto IS NULL OR a.validto >= mov.validto) AND a.validfrom <= mov.validto) AS porcentajeretencion, mov.validto AS fecha, upper(replace(replace(aoi.taxid::text, '-'::text, ''::text), '.'::text, ''::text)) AS rifagente, btrim(to_char(date_part('year'::text, mov.validto), '0000'::text)) || btrim(to_char(date_part('month'::text, mov.validto), '00'::text)) AS periodo, mov.ad_org_id AS org FROM hr_movement mov JOIN c_bpartner cb ON cb.c_bpartner_id = mov.c_bpartner_id JOIN ad_org ao ON ao.ad_org_id = mov.ad_org_id JOIN ad_orginfo aoi ON aoi.ad_org_id = ao.ad_org_id JOIN hr_concept c ON c.hr_concept_id = mov.hr_concept_id AND c.value::text = 'CC_IMPUESTO_SOBRE_LA_RENTA'::text;
